metadata.name: About “Regimental flutist”
metadata.description:
This is a special 1/1 NFT airdrop with a description and the history of creation of my “Revivere” oil painting “Regimental flutist”.

It includes:
- the story of the origin of the idea of the painting
- sketches and first drafts
- description of the symbols
- inspiration for the music
